title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Form
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Form 

and Content of Documents Delivered to Registrar) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 16 December 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited company act 2014 (form content document delivered registrar) regulation 2020 (2) regulation shall come operation 16 december 2020

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: In these Regulations—
text_norm: 2 regulations-- act mean company act 2014 (no 38 2014) delivered mean delivered registrar document meaning section 896 act

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 3. Documents shall be easily legible and suitable for electronic scanning
text_raw:
3. Documents shall be easily legible and suitable for electronic scanning 

and electronic copying.
text_norm: 3 document shall easily legible suitable electronic scanning electronic copying

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 4. A page of a document shall be—
text_raw:
4. A page of a document shall be— 

(a) 297 millimetres in length and 210 millimetres in width, that is to 

say A4 size, and 

(b) made of white paper with a matt finish weighing not less than 80 

grams per square millimetre.
text_norm: 4 page document shall be-- (a) 297 millimetre length 210 millimetre width say a4 size (b) made white paper matt finish weighing le 80 gram per square millimetre

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 5. The print in a document shall be—
text_raw:
5. The print in a document shall be— 

(a) black in colour, 

(b) not less than 1.8 millimetres in height, and 

(c) 

suitable and adequate for electronic scanning. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [628] 3
text_norm: 5 print document shall be-- (a) black colour (b) le 1.8 millimetre height (c) suitable adequate electronic scanning notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th december 2020 628 3

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 6. The layout of the printed matter on a page of a document shall be such
text_raw:
6. The layout of the printed matter on a page of a document shall be such 
as to provide a margin of not less than one centimetre all around the printed 
matter, that is to say, on the top and bottom and on each side, of it.
text_norm: 6 layout printed matter page document shall provide margin le one centimetre around printed matter say top bottom side it

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 7. A document shall not contain any colour other than the white of the
text_raw:
7. A document shall not contain any colour other than the white of the 

paper and the black of the printed matter.
text_norm: 7 document shall contain colour white paper black printed matter

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: If an original document contains coloured print or any of its pages
text_raw:
8. 

If an original document contains coloured print or any of its pages 
consist of glossy paper, a copy of the document, or a printer's proof of the 
document, complying with these Regulations shall be delivered.
text_norm: 8 original document contains coloured print page consist glossy paper copy document printer proof document complying regulation shall delivered

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 9. Pages of a document shall be kept together by means of a clip or staple
text_raw:
9. Pages of a document shall be kept together by means of a clip or staple 
at the top left-hand corner and shall not be stitched together or otherwise bound 
and shall not bear any adhesive tape.
text_norm: 9 page document shall kept together mean clip staple top left-hand corner shall stitched together otherwise bound shall bear adhesive tape

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 10. A document shall not consist of or contain a carbon copy or photocopy
text_raw:
10. A document shall not consist of or contain a carbon copy or photocopy 

or printed matter from a dot matrix computer printer.
text_norm: 10 document shall consist contain carbon copy photocopy printed matter dot matrix computer printer

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 11. A space in a document for the insertion of information shall not be left
text_raw:
11. A space in a document for the insertion of information shall not be left 
blank but, as appropriate, “not applicable”, “nil” or “none” or another similar 
word shall be inserted in the space.
text_norm: 11 space document insertion information shall left blank appropriate applicable nil none another similar word shall inserted space

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 12. (1) An amendment inserted in the contents of a document shall be
text_raw:
12. (1) An amendment inserted in the contents of a document shall be 
initialled and dated by at least one of the signatories to the document or, if 
there are no signatories by at least one of the persons who authorised its 
production. 

(2) Subject to paragraph (3), if a document delivered by a person is 
returned by the Registrar to the person for amendment, either, as the Registrar 
may determine, a new document shall be prepared or the contents of the 
document shall be amended and initialled and dated in accordance with 
paragraph (1), and thereafter the document shall be delivered. 

(3) If the document referred to in paragraph (2) is a statutory declaration, 
the person who made the declaration shall make another statutory declaration 
and deliver it as soon as practicable.
text_norm: 12 (1) amendment inserted content document shall initialled dated least one signatory document signatory least one person authorised production (2) subject paragraph (3) document delivered person returned registrar person amendment either registrar may determine new document shall prepared content document shall amended initialled dated accordance paragraph (1) thereafter document shall delivered (3) document referred paragraph (2) statutory declaration person made declaration shall make another statutory declaration deliver soon practicable

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 13. (1) Subject to paragraphs (2) and (3), the name of a company (as stated
text_raw:
13. (1) Subject to paragraphs (2) and (3), the name of a company (as stated 
in its constitution) shall be entered on the first page of a document in a 
prominent position. 

(2) The name and address referred to in paragraph (1) shall correspond 
with the information previously delivered to the Registrar in accordance with 
the Act. 

(3) If the name of the company includes one of the words or expressions 
“limited”, 
“cuideachta 
ghníomhaíochta ainmnithe”, “company limited by guarantee”, “cuideachta faoi 

“designated 

“teoranta”, 

company”, 

activity 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [628] 

theorainn ráthaíochta”, “unlimited company”, “cuideachta neamhtheoranta”, 
“public limited company” or “cuideachta phoiblí theoranta”, an abbreviated 
form of the word or expression may be used in the entry made under paragraph 
(1) in a document other than a document relating to the incorporation of a 
company, a change of name or the re-registration of a company or the 
constitution of a company. 

(4) The address of the registered office of a company on a document may 

not be given as a post office box number.
text_norm: 13 (1) subject paragraph (2) (3) name company (as stated constitution) shall entered first page document prominent position (2) name address referred paragraph (1) shall correspond information previously delivered registrar accordance act (3) name company includes one word expression limited cuideachta ghniomhaiochta ainmnithe company limited guarantee cuideachta faoi designated teoranta company activity 4 628 theorainn rathaiochta unlimited company cuideachta neamhtheoranta public limited company cuideachta phoibli theoranta abbreviated form word expression may used entry made paragraph (1) document document relating incorporation company change name re-registration company constitution company (4) address registered office company document may given post office box number

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 14. (1) An individual shall be referred to in a document by his or her
text_raw:
14. (1) An individual shall be referred to in a document by his or her 

surname and all of his or her first names. 

(2) Where the address of an individual is required to be stated in a 
document, his or her residential address shall be stated, unless some other 
address is required by law to be stated.
text_norm: 14 (1) individual shall referred document surname first name (2) address individual required stated document residential address shall stated unless address required law stated

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 15. The form and content of a document delivered under a scheme of the
text_raw:
15. The form and content of a document delivered under a scheme of the 
Registrar for giving priority to the examination and registration by the 
Registrar of the document or documents of a specified class shall be in 
compliance with the rules and requirements of the scheme.
text_norm: 15 form content document delivered scheme registrar giving priority examination registration registrar document document specified class shall compliance rule requirement scheme

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 16. Where any matter is included in a document under a provision of the
text_raw:
16. Where any matter is included in a document under a provision of the 
Act, or of an instrument made under the Act, or such a provision is otherwise 
relevant to the matter, the provision shall be identified in the document.
text_norm: 16 matter included document provision act instrument made act provision otherwise relevant matter provision shall identified document

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 17. (1) An application to the Registrar in the form prescribed for the
text_raw:
17. (1) An application to the Registrar in the form prescribed for the 

purposes of the Act in relation to the registration of a company— 

(a) 

shall correspond and be in compliance with the constitution 
where the constitution, 

(i) 

provides for a minimum number of directors, or 

contains the names of the first-appointed directors and the 
first-appointed secretary, 

(ii) 

and 

(b) 

subject to paragraph (2), may be signed by an individual acting 
as agent for all or any of the subscribers to the constitution, but 
may not be completed on behalf of a company acting as such an 
agent. 

(2) Where a subscriber referred to in paragraph (1)(b) is a company, the 
application to the Registrar shall be signed by an officer of the company 
authorised in that behalf. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [628] 5
text_norm: 17 (1) application registrar form prescribed purpose act relation registration company-- (a) shall correspond compliance constitution constitution (i) provides minimum number director contains name first-appointed director first-appointed secretary (ii) (b) subject paragraph (2) may signed individual acting agent subscriber constitution may completed behalf company acting agent (2) subscriber referred paragraph (1)(b) company application registrar shall signed officer company authorised behalf 628 5

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 18. If a declaration of solvency for the purposes of section 207(1) or 580(2)
text_raw:
18. If a declaration of solvency for the purposes of section 207(1) or 580(2) 
of the Act is made on the date of the passing of the resolution for winding up 
the company concerned— 

(a) 

(b) 

the time of the making of the statutory declaration shall be stated 
in the declaration, and 

the time of the passing of the resolution shall be stated in the 
resolution.
text_norm: 18 declaration solvency purpose section 207(1) 580(2) act made date passing resolution winding company concerned-- (a) (b) time making statutory declaration shall stated declaration time passing resolution shall stated resolution

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 19. A document shall not refer to a person who is an officer, liquidator,
text_raw:
19. A document shall not refer to a person who is an officer, liquidator, 
receiver, or examiner, of a company unless the Registrar has been notified, as 
required under the Act, of the name and appointment of the person.
text_norm: 19 document shall refer person officer liquidator receiver examiner company unless registrar notified required act name appointment person

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 20. Documents delivered by the liquidator of a company shall not relate to
text_raw:
20. Documents delivered by the liquidator of a company shall not relate to 
a period, or to accounts for a period, beginning at any time after its 
incorporation and after a period for which accounts of the company, or any 
other documents of the company for that period required by or under the Act to 
be delivered, have not been delivered.
text_norm: 20 document delivered liquidator company shall relate period account period beginning time incorporation period account company document company period required act delivered delivered

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 21. The return delivered in relation to a company by a liquidator—
text_raw:
21. The return delivered in relation to a company by a liquidator— 

(a) under section 705(4)(b) of the Act, in the case of a members' 

voluntary winding up, 

(b) under section 706(4)(b) of the Act, in the case of a creditors' 

voluntary winding up or court winding up, or 

(c) 

under sections 680(3) and 681(2) of the Act, in the case of any 
winding up, 

shall not relate to a period that is after another period during the liquidation for 
which no return in relation to the company has been delivered.
text_norm: 21 return delivered relation company liquidator-- (a) section 705(4)(b) act case member voluntary winding (b) section 706(4)(b) act case creditor voluntary winding court winding (c) section 680(3) 681(2) act case winding shall relate period another period liquidation return relation company delivered

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 22. A copy of the text of a resolution passed by a company that is delivered
text_raw:
22. A copy of the text of a resolution passed by a company that is delivered 
shall be signed either by a director of the company whose appointment as a 
director has been notified to the Registrar or, if the appointment of the 
secretary of the company as secretary has been so notified, by the secretary.
text_norm: 22 copy text resolution passed company delivered shall signed either director company whose appointment director notified registrar appointment secretary company secretary notified secretary

title: and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise,
heading: 23. The Registrar shall not accept any documents relating to the winding up
text_raw:
23. The Registrar shall not accept any documents relating to the winding up 

of a company unless the Registrar has received— 

(a) 

(b) 

a copy of the resolution for the winding up of the company, in 
the case of a voluntary liquidation, or 

an office copy of the order of the court directing the winding up 
of the company, in any other case. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [628] 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 15 December 2020 

ROBERT TROY, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [628] 7 

Explanatory Note 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations provide for the manner of completion of documents 
delivered to the Registrar of Companies. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [628]
